Rhapsody.server.communications

Class TunnelProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Rhapsody.server.communications.TunnelProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, BusDriverInterface, PassengerInterface, PorterInterface

    public class TunnelProvider
extends java.lang.Thread
implements PassengerInterface, BusDriverInterface, PorterInterface
    Provides the necessary channels to redirect the messages in order to be unwrapped and processed. Impersonates the clients
